description: This file defines a React functional component named PaymentWidget that acts as a placeholder payment interface, simulating payment processing behavior with mock UI elements and callbacks.

methods.name: PaymentWidget({ clientSecret, amount, currency = "USD", onSuccess, onError })

methods.name: simulatePayment
methods.description: Asynchronous function simulating a payment process, invoking onSuccess or onError callbacks.
